name: KINDLING GROVE
description:
KINDLING GROVE

NOTE: The defense level might be kind of hard. You just need to shoot the enemies 10 times.

Made in 48 hours (~16-20?) for GMTK 2020 Game Jam. My first game jam game. :)

There are a few graphical bugs but I think I did a good job. There are two endings.

The endings aren't the best but I'm not a writer. :p

Uses game boy resolution (scaled x3).
